name: Melba ACOSTA-FEBO, et al., petitioners, v. FRANKLIN CALIFORNIA TAX-FREE TRUST, et al.
name_abbreviation: Acosta-Febo v. Franklin Cal. Tax-Free Trust

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Melba ACOSTA-FEBO, et al., petitioners,
v.
FRANKLIN CALIFORNIA TAX-FREE TRUST, et al.
attorneys: Motion of Fundacion Angel Ramos, Inc., et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae in No. 15-233 granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the First Circuit granted. The case is consolidated and a total of one hour is allotted for oral argument.
casebody.head_matter:
Melba ACOSTA-FEBO, et al., petitioners,
v.
FRANKLIN CALIFORNIA TAX-FREE TRUST, et al.
No. 15-255.
Supreme Court of the United States
Dec. 4, 2015.
Motion of Fundacion Angel Ramos, Inc., et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae in No. 15-233 granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the First Circuit granted. The case is consolidated and a total of one hour is allotted for oral argument.
Justice ALITO took no part in the consideration or decision of this motion and this petition.
